text: Hi everyone. I was waiting for this update reflecting the new design manager on the FTP server. Now I’m trying to setup a workflow with gulp + vinyl-ftp and I’m running in the same issue <@U3A4KEWK1> is mentioning. Folders get created, but as soon as a file is uploaded it stops with ‘Error: socket hang up’ and the file isn’t uploaded.

<@UBM2D9L5N> I've since started using the synchronize directory feature in WinSCP <https://winscp.net/eng/download.php>. Not as good as having it right there in Gulp, but better than having to manually drag/copy files all the time.
